caption.center: THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, Respondent, v. ANGELO SPARACO,

court.center: Court of Appeals of the State of New York.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Appellate Division of the Supreme Court in the Second Judicial Department, JOSEPH R. CORSO, J.Page 654
opinion.attorneys:
Stanley M. Hyman and Peter L.F. Sabbatino for appellant.
Eugene Gold, District Attorney (Arthur Friedman of counsel), for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Order affirmed; no opinion.
Concur: Chief Judge FULD and Judges BURKE, GABRIELLI and WACHTLER. Judges BREITEL, JASEN and JONES concur on constraint ofPeople v. Mulligan (29 N.Y.2d 20).
